meanings.sent1: The doctor described the patient's anginose symptoms.
meanings.sent2: Her anginose appearance worried her family.
meanings.sent3: The anginose expression on his face made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The sky had an anginose hue as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: The anginose smell of flowers filled the room.

meanings.definition: Having the appearance or symptoms of angina.
meanings.sent1: The anginose pain in his chest was concerning.
meanings.sent2: She had an anginose look of discomfort on her face.
meanings.sent3: The anginose sound of his cough startled the room.
meanings.sent4: The old house had an anginose creak in its floors.
meanings.sent5: The anginose feeling in her throat made her anxious.
